name: Parasites (Rising Retro)
description:
A game made in a few hours for Brackey's Game Jam.

A small microbe is stuck in an unknown void unless he finds out that everyone around him has turned into parasites that are coming for him. While saving himself from the parasites, he gets to know about his hidden powers, to shoot laser. And if a parasite which is not real (half infected host) approaches him, it gets cured.

He finds that HE IS THE CURE.

Anyways, if a parasite starts turning blue, DON'T KILL IT as it is not real. The real parasites must be killed before they infect you.

Use WASD to move and mouse pointer to look around along with left click to shoot. Classic controls, right?

You get score for killing real parasites and saving half parasites but your health gets down if you kill a half parasites.

Comment down your high score :>

Credits:
  • Programming: Rising Retro
  • Art: Spriters Resource 
  • Music: OpenGameArt.org
  • Tools used: Aseprite and Godot
